projects.title: Pokemon
projects.description: Pokemon index. Search or browse for pokemons and view details for each species. Connected to the pokeapi API. State handled with React-query

projects.title: Bmerketo CMS
projects.description: A CMS website for a fake company. You can add, edit and delete products. Backend built with Nodejs(express, mongoose) and connected to mongoDB, full CRUD. You can also view placed orders and edit the order status. Login handled with Nodejs

projects.title: Baked
projects.description: Ecommerce website. Add products to cart and proceed to checkout if logged in. Data is stored using JSON-server and state handled with Redux-toolkit. Login/registration built with Firebase

projects.title: Movies
projects.description: Movie database connected to the OMDb API. Search and view details of movies/shows. State handled with React-query and styled with Tailwind. You can login/register through Auth0. The API was very strict and only allowed searches, no filtering or categorizing was possible

projects.title: Blogs
projects.description: Create, edit or delete your posts. Backend built with Nodejs(express, mongoose) and connected to mongoDB. Styled with Bootstrap. Login/registration handled with Nodejs
